summary: Weatherman from a TV network goes back to his hometown, Vale da Rocha, a place in Northeast Brazil, devastated by the drought. He is forced to face the geographic elements and his own memories.
cast: Guilherme Weber|Giulia Gam|José Dumont|Mariana Lima|Selton Mello|Gustavo Falcão|Matheus Nachtergaele|Aramis Trindade|Luiz Carlos Vasconcelos|Maria de Jesus Bacarelli|Suyane Moreira|Renata Sorrah|Paulo César Peréio|José Celso Martinez Corrêa|Magdale Alves|Cláudio Ferrario
title: Árido Movie
